sub_title: Communications & PR Specialist - Office lead at Archetype Benelux - Looking for new talent
summary:
I am a senior PR and communications professional with a passion for tech and doing business for good. 
Help brands to become better storytellers and create more impact is what I love to do. 

Nowadays I work as office lead and senior communications consultant for global marketing communications agency Archetype; an agency specialized in, but not limited to the tech industry. Earlier I have been working at communications agency FleishmanHillard as digital specialist. 

I am experienced in working with both global and local companies with challenges across communication disciplines such as corporate communications, social media, crisis communications, PR, CSR and reputation management. 

Strategic but pragmatic | disruptive thinker | team player | content specialist

awards.title: Nomination Digital Communication Award - 'Philips Light Up The Dark'
awards.description:
Nomination for a Digital Communication Award in the CSR category with the Philips Light Up The Dark project.

With winter days averaging a mere six hours of daylight, residents of Uppsala spend months in seemingly endless darkness. To evaluate the impact of light on quality of life, Philips has worked together with the City of Uppsala and our partner Bjerking to see how lighting innovation can help families be more active outdoors – even in the depths of winter darkness.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?t=2&v=UHnGGO9icD8
awards.issuer: Quadriga University of Applied Sciences - www.digital-awards.eu

awards.title: Nomination Sabre Awards 'Philips -  The Social Heart of Surgery'
Digital Communication Award 'Philips - The Social Heart of Surgery'
awards.description:
Recognition for communication strategy and implementation by winning the European Digital Communication Award within category "Social Media and Community - Twitter Profile" with the Philips project 'The social heart of surgery'. The award was granted for most innovative and efficient microblog.

Early 2012, Philips and Catharina Hospital in the Netherlands worked together on a social media initiative based on storytelling to show how rewarding healthcare innovations can be for both patients and society. During the campaign we could follow a real heart patient on his way towards a better life. 

The European Digital Communication Awards is a transparent and independent competition with standardised rating criteria based on academic standards, a high-level jury panel formed by leading practitioners and academics will rate superior online strategies, campaigns and social media tools from across Europe.

Strategic approach, creativity, innovation, implementation and efficiency are the evaluation criteria the jury will use to assess the submitted entries before deciding on the winners.
awards.issuer: Quadriga University of Applied Sciences - http://www.digital-awards.eu/

awards.title: Nomination European Excellence Awards 'Philips - The Social Heart of Surgery'

projects.title: Google World Cup Social Influencers campaign - Google Trends
projects.description: When the 2014 World Cup began, Google unveiled a global World Cup Trends Newsroom to turn search data surrounding soccer games into shareable content/infographics. For the duration of the World Cup, a team of data scientists, designers, editors, and translators have been working on shareable original content in multiple languages. In my role as Senior Account Manager I have been managing the Dutch social influencers campaign.

projects.title: Project Manager & Sr. communications consultant Social Intranet at De Nederlandsche Bank
projects.description: Program management of a new and future proof intranet for De Nederlandsche Bank (DNB). This project includes stakeholder research, market orientation and alignment with internal stakeholders including IT, resulting in a set of intranet requirements and a business case.

projects.title: Corporate Affairs Coordinator External Communications at Mars Nederland
projects.description: As Corporate Affairs Coordinator with a focus on external communications I have been seconded at Mars for a few months to help the corporate communications team. In my role I have been working on ongoing communications project including the PR policy, a proactive communications approach, messaging, issue management and social media management.

projects.title: International Children's Peace Prize 2013 & 2014
projects.description: The International Children’s Peace Prize, an initiative of the KidsRights Foundation, is awarded annually to a child who has shown special dedication to children’s rights. As Senior Account Manager I have been responsible for the communications and PR strategy for KidsRights until mid 2015 with a special focus on the award ceremony in 2013 (winner Malala Yousafzai) and 2014 (winner Neha Gupta). Throughout the years I have been working closely with the dedicated KidsRights team on the communications and media strategy, including messaging, content strategy and the social media approach.

projects.title: Philips Foundation - Digital project management and communcations consultant
projects.description: The Philips Foundation is a registered charity committed to affecting lasting change on a global level. As communications consultant I have been working with the Foundation team to set up an independent, registered charity in 2014 (an Royal Philips initiative). I supported the team as digital program manager with the realization of the website, messaging and the online and social strategy.

authors.headline: Communications & PR Specialist - Office lead at Archetype Benelux - Looking for new talent

profile_positions.description: As Managing Consultant for Archetype in the Benelux (ex-Text100) I am co-leading the agency into a new phase of growth. As global communications and PR agency we build magnetic brands. In the Benelux we support local and international organizations with strategic communications, PR, content en digital communications. As strategic communications experts I work for innovative tech brands such as AWS, Lenovo, Salesforce, Schneider Electric, Pleo, Palo Alto Networks, EVBox, Zebra and Snowflake.
profile_positions.title: Managing Consultant

profile_positions.description: Text100 is a global marketing communications agency. From Amsterdam we service clients in the Benelux.   We make our client's words matter in a world dominated by technology, disruption and speed. In my role I am responsible for strategy and leading our teams for clients as Lenovo, Motorola, TomTom, Amazon and Schneider Electric.
profile_positions.title: Principal Consultant

profile_positions.description: Digital specialist for Future Communication, a communications agency specialized in, but not limited to, the public sector. I have been working on building and strengthening the online proposition and digital expertise within the Future Communication team. Furthermore I have been seconded for 6 months at DNB (Dutch National Bank) as project manager and Senior Communications Consultant. In this assignment I delivered a business case for a new social intranet.
profile_positions.title: Online Communications Consultant

profile_positions.description:
FleishmanHillard is an international strategic communications firm. The agency creates integrated content and campaigns that deliver measurable impact for a broad range of global and local clients. In my role as digital communications consultant I have been focusing on:
- digital communications & social media (digital lead 2014 & 2015)
- content & creativity (content & creativity lead in 2015)

Specialties: digital & social strategy, content strategy, CSR, corporate communications, crisis & issues, creative integrated communication campaigns.

Clients I have been working for: Philips (both corporate and Benelux), The Philips Foundation, security and safety organization G4S, Mars Nederland, Akzo Nobel, Marktplaats (eBay Classifieds), Google, Telfort, The KidsRights Foundation and Vueling. Some of my projects are listed below.
profile_positions.title: Digital communications consultant

profile_positions.description: Lamar communicatie is a communications agency specialized in effective communications and powerful content. In my role as communications consultant and copywriter, I have been working for both B2B and B2C clients, including Syntens, Landal GreenParks, G4S, Blue Sky Group, SOS International and LUMC.
profile_positions.title: Communications consultant & copywriter

profile_positions.description: Imaginatio has been a part of Lab Venture Capital. A laboratory for innovative and creative projects within the field of internet, television, advertising and mobile. We've developed creative event concepts and integrated communication strategies for clients such as CNV. I've been working as event manager, communications and PR executive.
profile_positions.title: Project manager & communications executive

profile_positions.description: Fundraising coordinator for different street campaigns for NGO's. My responsibility: managing campaigns and coaching street fundraisers for organizations such as Slachtofferhulp Nederland, Childright, Homeplan and MSi.
profile_positions.title: Fundraising Coordinator

profile_positions.description: To support my bachelors thesis about concept brands with a strong footprint in CSR, I've been working on a proposal to better integrate and implement the social brand message from Ben & Jerry's during outdoor cinema festival Pleinbios in Rotterdam.
profile_positions.title: Graduation project

profile_positions.description: During my first study I've been working as an account intern at advertising agency ARA Direct, supporting the account managers for clients such as Network VSP, TNT and the Aruba Tourist board.
profile_positions.title: Internship - account executive
